comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Orthodox Church Architecture, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 27644318@N08
comment._content:
The correct name of the church in Italian is: Sant'Apollinare Nuovo.
I like very much the images of my city of your collection!
